In addition to posting individual, [highlighted ML applications](https://uw-madison-datascience.github.io/ML-X-Nexus/Applications/Highlights/) from conferences, webinars, etc., the Nexus platform curates a list of playlists where you can explore a larger selection of talks (application focused).
